biocontainers.name: hicstuff
biocontainers.summary: General purpose stuff to generate and handle hi-c data in its simplest form.

biotools.summary: A lightweight library that generates and handles Hi-C contact maps in either cooler-compatible 2Dbedgraph or instaGRAAL format.

bioschemas.name: hicstuff
bioschemas.summary: A lightweight library that generates and handles Hi-C contact maps in either cooler-compatible 2Dbedgraph or instaGRAAL format.
